maqras.text: 43|24|modeun seonjijaneun neohuiga seonjo deullobuteo balgyeon han geosboda deo na-eun bog-eum-eul gajigo wassnolago malhaess-euna bulsinjaneun dangsindeul-eul tonghayeo bonaeeojin geos-eul midji anhneunda malhadeola
43|25|geulihayeo hananim-i geu beol-eul naelisini bola jinlileul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ui malloga eotteo haessdeonyo
43|26|abeulaham-eun geuui abeojiwa baegseongdeul-ege malhagil sillo jeoneun yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-eul sungbaehaji anihamyeo
43|27|naleul changjohasin hananimman-eul gyeongbaehanani sillo geubunkkeseo naleul indohasil geos-ila
43|28|abeulaham-eun geuui husondeul-egei mal-eul namgyeoss-euni amado geudeul-eun hananimkkelo dol-agalila
43|29|geuleona hananim-eun ideulgwa i deul seonjodeul-ege jinliwa sasil-eul balghyeojuneun han seonjijaga imhal ttaekka ji hyeonse-ui salm-eul hyanglaghadoleug dueoss nola
43|30|geuleona jinliga geudeul-ege i leuleoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun igeos-eun masul-e bulgwahani ulineun igeos-eul midji anh eulilago malhadeola
43|31|bulsinjaneun i kkulan-i du dosi ui jidoja-egeneun gyesidoeji ani hayeossdeonyo lago muddeola

43|32|geudeul-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeleul bunbaehandan mal-inyo hyeonse-ui saenghwalsog eseo geudeul-ege saenghwal-ui yangsig-eul bun baehaneun geos-eun hananim-isila geudeuljung-ilbuegeneun jiwileul daleun ja boda nop-i dueo geudeullo hayeogeum daleun jadeul-eul jidohadolog hayeossnola geuleonageudae junim-ui eunhyeneun geudeul-i chugjeog han jaemulboda deoug joh-eun geos-ila

43|33|baegseongdeul-i bulsin-ui muliga doe lyeo haji ani handamyeon hananim-eun jabilousin geubun-eul modoghan gagjaleul wihae geudeul-ui jib jibung-gwa geudeul-i oleuneun gyedan-eul eun-eulo jangsighayeo jul sudo iss-eulila
43|34|geudeul-ui jib mundeuldo geuligo geudeul-ui gidaeneun chimsangdo eun-eulo jangsig doel su iss-eumyeo
43|35|geum-eulodo jangsigdoel su iss-euli la geuleona i modeun geos-eun hyeonsesaeng hwal-ui hyanglag-e bulgwahamyeo geudae junim ap-ui naeseneun uiloun jadeul-eul wihae issnola
43|36|hananim-eun geubun-ui jabilousingyohun-eulobuteo oemyeonhaneun jaleul wihaesatan-eul dusa satan-i geuui chinguga doedeola
43|37|geulihayeo satandeul-i geudeullo hayeogeum baleun gil-eseo beos-eonage ha na geudeul-eun seuseuloga olh-eun gillo indodoeneun geos-eulo saeng-gaghanola
43|38|geuga hananimkke ileuleo malha deola neowa na saie dongjjoggwa seo jjog saiui geoli mankeum-ina saiga iss-eoss-eumyeon joh-ass-eulyeonman sillo saaghanmulila
43|39|neohuiga jeojileun joeag-eulo in hayeo geunal-eneun eoneu geosdo neohuie ge yuyonghaji moshani neohuineun hamkke beol-eul bad-eulila
43|40|geudaeneun gwimeogeolilo hayeogeum deudge hal su iss-eumyeo jangnimgwa banghwanghaneun jaleul indohal su issneunyo
43|41|hananim-i geudaeleul geoduwogan huelado geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol eul naelisinila
43|42|hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege yagsoghan geos-eul geudaeege boyeo julini sillo geubun-eun geudeul-eul jeabhal neunglyeog-eulo chungmanhasinila
43|43|geudaeege gyesidoen geos-eul jiki la sillo geudaeneun godbaleun gil-wie issnola
43|44|sillo geugeos-eun geudaewa geudae baegseong-eul wihan bog-eum-ini neohuiga god jilmun-eul bad-eulila
43|45|geudae ijeon hananim-ui seonjija deul-ege mul-eobola jabilousin ha nanim oee daleun geos-eul sungbaehala ha yeossdeonyo
43|46|hananim-eun geubun-ui malsseumgwa deobul-eo moseleul palaowa geuui chujongjadeul-ege bonaeni naneun man-yuui junim-i bonaen han seonjijala malhayeossdeola
43|47|geuleona geuga hananim-ui malsseum eul gajigo geudeul-ege gass-eul ttae geudeul eun bius-eossnola
43|48|geulihayeo hananim-eun chalyelo ijeon-ui geosboda deo keun geos-eulo geudeul eul beolhayeo geudeul-i hananim-egelo gwiuihagileul balaessnola
43|49|geudeul-i malhagil o masulsayeo geubunkkeseo dangsinkke seong-yaghan daelo u lileul wihae gidohala geulihamyeon u liga dangsin-eul mid-euliyo lago hadeo la
43|50|hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo beol-eulgeodueo juni bola geudeul-eun yagsog-eul kkaetteulinola

43|51|palaoneun geuui baegseongdeul-ege baegseongdeul-iyeo aegub-ui wang-gug-i na an e issji anhneunyo ttohan gangmul-i nae gungjeon mit-eulo heuleuji anhneunyo geulae do neohuineun ihaehaji moshaneunyo
43|52|bojalgeos eobsneun geuligo ungbyeondo eobsneun i sanaeleul bola naega deo hul lyunghaji anhneunyo
43|53|geuegeneun geumpaljjido eobs-eumyeo cheonsadeuldo geuleul ttalaojido anhneundanmal-inyo
43|54|ileohdeus geuneun geuui baegseongdeul-eul eoliseogge hani geudeul-eun geuege bog jonghayeoss-eumae sillo geudeul-eun joejieun baegseongdeul-ieossnola
43|55|geudeul-i hananim-eul yogdoege ha yeoss-eul ttae geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol-eul naelisa geudeul moduleul mul-e igsake hayeossnola
43|56|hananim-eun geudeul-ui seonlyeleul hu sedaeleul wihan gyohun-eulo sam-assnola
